title: sans serif
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
Leviathan by Hoefler & Co. appears to be a match for the second image, and for the tagline on the first image:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/leviathan/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150352/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/leviathan/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/leviathan/overview/")

However, it is not a match for |Fruut| on the first image. Best guess there is Bemio Italic, by Joe Prince:  
 [http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=bemio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150352/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=bemio "http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=bemio")
